name: @chialab/proteins
description: A primer for JavaScript libraries and frameworks development.

scripts.build: npm run types && rimraf dist && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist/esm && rna build src/index.js --format esm --output dist/esm/proteins.js
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && rna build src/index.js --format cjs --output dist/cjs/proteins.cjs
scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:node
scripts.docs:
(echo "# API Reference
"; rna apidoc src/index.ts -F markdown) > docs/API.md

author: Chialab <dev@chialab.io> (https://www.chialab.it)
